00036 class KMCSingle : public KMCCalculator 
00037 {
00038 public:
00039     KMCSingle() {};
00040    ~KMCSingle() {};
00041 
00042     void Initialize(const char *filename, Property *options );
00043     bool EvaluateFrame();
00044 
00045 protected:
00046             void LoadGraph();
00047             void RunKMC(void);
00048             void WriteOcc(void);
00049 
00050             map<int , node_t *> _nodes_lookup;
00051             vector<node_t *> _nodes;
00052             map<int , node_t *> _injection_lookup;
00053             vector<node_t *> _injection;
00054             string _injection_name;
00055             double _runtime;
00056             double _dt;
00057             int _seed;
00058             string _filename; // HACK
00059             
00060 };
00061 
00062 void KMCSingle::Initialize(const char *filename, Property *options )
00063 {
00064         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.runtime")) {
00065             _runtime = options->get("options.kmcsingle.runtime").as<double>();
00066         }
00067         else {
00068             std::runtime_error("Error in kmcsingle: total run time is not provided");
00069         }
00070 
00071         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.outputtime")) {
00072             _dt = options->get("options.kmcsingle.outputtime").as<double>();
00073         }
00074         else {
00075             std::runtime_error("Error in kmcsingle: output frequency is not provided");
00076         }
00077 
00078         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.seed")) {
00079             _seed = options->get("options.kmcsingle.seed").as<int>();
00080         }
00081         else {
00082             std::runtime_error("Error in kmcsingle: seed is not provided");
00083         }
00084         
00085         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.injection")) {
00086             _injection_name = options->get("options.kmcsingle.injection").as<string>();
00087         }
00088         else {
00089             std::runtime_error("Error in kmcsingle: injection pattern is not provided");
00090         }
00091         
00092         _filename = filename;
00093 
00094        //cout << _seed << endl;
00095        srand(_seed);
00096        votca::tools::Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00097 
00098 }
00099 
00100 bool KMCSingle::EvaluateFrame()
00101 {
00102 
00103     LoadGraph();
00104     RunKMC();
00105     return true;
00106 }
00107 
00108 void KMCSingle::LoadGraph() {
00109 
00110     Database db;
00111     db.Open( _filename );
00112     cout << " Loading graph from " << _filename << endl;
00113     Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT _id,name FROM conjsegs;");
00114 
00115     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00116         int id = stmt->Column<int>(0);
00117         string name = stmt->Column<string>(1);
00118         node_t *n =new node_t(id);
00119         _nodes.push_back(n);
00120         _nodes_lookup[id] = _nodes.back();
00121         if (wildcmp(_injection_name.c_str(), name.c_str())) {
00122             _injection.push_back(n);
00123             _injection_lookup[id] = _injection.back();
00124         }
00125     }
00126     //delete stmt;
00127     cout << "  -Nodes: " << _nodes.size() << endl;
00128     cout << "  -Injection Points: " << _injection.size() << endl;
00129 
00130     delete stmt;
00131 
00132     int links = 0;
00133     stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT conjseg1, conjseg2, rate12, rate21, r_x, r_y, r_z FROM pairs;");
00134     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00135         node_t *n1 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(0)];
00136         node_t *n2 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(1)];
00137         double rate12 = stmt->Column<double>(2);
00138         double rate21 = stmt->Column<double>(3);
00139         vec r = vec(stmt->Column<double>(4), stmt->Column<double>(5), stmt->Column<double>(6));
00140         n1->AddEvent(new link_t(n2, rate12, r));
00141         n2->AddEvent(new link_t(n1, rate21, -r));
00142         links += 2;
00143     }
00144     delete stmt;
00145     cout << "  -Links: " << links << endl;
00146 
00147 }
00148 
00149 void KMCSingle::RunKMC(void)
00150 {
00151 
00152         double t = 0;
00153 
00154         srand(_seed);
00155         votca::tools::Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00156 
00157         // cout << " seed:size:site " << _seed << ":" << _injection.size() << ":" << Random::rand_uniform_int(_injection.size()) << endl;
00158         current=_injection[Random::rand_uniform_int(_injection.size())];
00159         cout <<" Starting simulation at node: "<<current->_id-1<<endl;
00160         double next_output = _dt;
00161     int i=0;
00162     while(t<_runtime) {
00163         t+=current->WaitingTime();
00164                 current->onExecute();
00165         if(t > next_output) {
00166                 next_output = t + _dt;
00167                 cout << t << ": " << r << endl;
00168         }
00169     }
00170     _runtime = t;
00171     WriteOcc();
00172     cout << std::scientific << "\nKMC run finished\nAverage velocity (m/s): " << r/t*1e-9 << endl;
00173 }
00174 
00175 void KMCSingle::WriteOcc()
00176 {
00177     Database db;
00178     cout << "Opening for writing " << _filename << endl;
00179         db.Open(_filename);
00180         db.Exec("BEGIN;");
00181         Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("UPDATE conjsegs SET occ = ? WHERE _id = ?;");
00182         for(int i=0; i<_nodes.size(); ++i) {
00183                 stmt->Reset();
00184                 stmt->Bind(1, _nodes[i]->_occ/_runtime);
00185                 stmt->Bind(2, _nodes[i]->_id);
00186                 stmt->Step();
00187         }
00188         db.Exec("END;");
00189         delete stmt;
00190 }
